negotiation_strategy.justification: Margaret is price-conscious but values dignity and quality. A collaborative approach that explains value while offering flexibility aligns with her communication style and concerns about being taken advantage of. This strategy builds trust by showing willingness to adjust while maintaining professional standards.

contract_completion.payment_terms: 12 monthly installments with 0% interest (5% service fee added to total)
required_disclosures: Funds will be placed in a state-approved funeral trust account
Client may modify arrangements in the future (price guarantees apply only to original selections)
Military honors coordination requires submission of DD214 form
